actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 107-49 Including Amdt. to S. 287.

official_title: A bill to direct the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to impose cost-of-service based rates on sales by public utilities of electric energy at wholesale in the western energy market.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to impose cost-of-service based rates on sales by public utilities of electric energy at wholesale in the western energy market.Mandates that such imposed cost-of-service based electric energy rates remain in effect until the market for electric energy in the western energy market reflects just and reasonable rates as determined by FERC.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to impose cost-of-service based rates on sales by public utilities of electric energy at wholesale in the western energy market.
